attributes.action: protect the beleaguered British Taxpayers by refusing to 'bail out' any Eurozone Country (such as Greece) which refuses to take the same harsh economic measures that we, The British, have been forced to face up to.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a strong probability that all EEC countries will be asked to contribute significant sums in order that Countries such as Greece can continue to live beyond their means. We have a similar debt burden but will receive no aid to help us!
